summary: net: tun: avoid disabling NAPI twice
details:
net: tun: avoid disabling NAPI twice

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.204 by commit 5eac00ef2a11a0be77266f370151c903955991da, it was introduced in version v5.4.204 by commit ea0519bc578d2d2bce210cc34f3b0463ff0dcac3. For more details please see the references link.
